definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
(like) a cat on a hot tin roof/anxious/agitated
pinyin: re4 guo1 shang5 de5 ma3 yi3

definition: lit. mole cricket and ants/fig. tiny individuals with no power
an ant hole may cause the collapse of a great dike (idiom)/huge damage may result from a moment's negligence
pinyin: qian1 li3 zhi1 di1 , kui4 yu2 yi3 xue2

definition: like ants pursuing a stink (idiom); the mob chases the rich and powerful/the crowd runs after trash
fire ant (Solenopsis invicta), an introduced species in China

"ants climbing a tree", a Sichuan dish made with cellophane noodles 粉絲|粉丝[fen3 si1] and ground meat (so called because the particles of meat clinging to the noodles look like ants on the twigs of a tree)/(sex position) man standing, woman clinging to his upper body/(erotic massage) full-body licking
Ant Financial Services Group, an affiliate company of Alibaba 阿里巴巴[A1 li3 ba1 ba1]

sentences.english: Formic perfectness and OK treat kind of rheumatism?
sentences.chinese: 蟻精通可以治療類風溼嗎？

sentences.english: An ant colony optimization based algorithm for permutation flow shop scheduling was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種求解置換流水車間調度的蟻羣優化算法。

sentences.english: Recently, ACO algorithm is widely used to study TSP problems.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，蟻羣優化算法廣泛應用於TSP問題的研究。

sentences.english: The workers' duties include carrying the colony's pre-adult pupae while migrating. (?
sentences.chinese: 在遷移時刻搬運即將成熟的蟻蛹是工蟻們的職責之一。

sentences.english: Colonies operate through organised co-operation and task-sharing.
sentences.chinese: 蟻羣通過有組織的合作和分擔任務進行運轉。

sentences.english: Our hilarious Ant-Man had a funny fight with Falcon.
sentences.chinese: 獵鷹和我們新任的逗逼蟻人在這裏有了場搞笑的對決。

sentences.english: Ant colony algorithms have widely applied to solve many combinatory problems now.
sentences.chinese: 目前蟻羣算法被廣泛應用於許多組合優化問題。

sentences.english: Ant colony system is a novel emerged stochastic searching optimization algorithm in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 蟻羣算法是近年來新出現的一種隨機搜索尋優算法。

sentences.english: During his life, he saw the sale of more than twenty million of his ant colonies.
sentences.chinese: 在他的一生中，他看到了二十多萬，他蟻羣出售。

sentences.english: They are busy carrying food, but the ant colony and egoistic.
sentences.chinese: 它們忙着搬食物，但蟻羣裏也有自私自利的傢伙。

sentences.english: BPP is theoretic NP-hard, can be solved by ant colony optimization (ACO).
sentences.chinese: 雙層規劃問題是NP難題，可以應用蟻羣算法解決。

sentences.english: There was, of course, no way could the two colonies have checked  take-off time with each other.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，這兩個蟻羣根本沒有辦法校對彼此的起飛時間。

sentences.english: A hybrid algorithm combining ant colony system with multi-choice Knapsack problem was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種蟻羣系統與多選擇揹包問題融合的算法。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new improved ACO.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，該文提出了一種新的改進蟻羣算法。

sentences.english: Ant Colony System (ACS) is an effective algorithm to solve combinatorial problems such as TSPs.
sentences.chinese: 蟻羣算法是一種解決組合優化問題的有效算法。

sentences.english: Green tree ants in Queensland, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 生活在澳洲昆士蘭的綠樹蟻。

definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
